Class EndScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.TextDisplay

  • public class EndScreen
extends TextDisplay

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class demolition.TextDisplay

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EndScreen(int x, int y, java.lang.String line)
      Creates a new end screen object which extends from all of the attributes and methods from the TextDisplay super class, including text(), createFont(), textFont(), textSize(), getX() and getY().

    • Constructor Detail

      • EndScreen

        public EndScreen(int x,
                 int y,
                 java.lang.String line)
        Creates a new end screen object which extends from all of the attributes and methods from the TextDisplay super class, including text(), createFont(), textFont(), textSize(), getX() and getY().
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the end screen
        y - the y-coordinate of the end screen
        line - the line to be displayed based on the outcome of the game
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        TextDisplay
